overview: Black Fairy Dust is a crafting material dropped by Pumpkings during the Pumpkin Moon. It is solely used to craft Tattered Fairy Wings.
tips: Selling the Tattered Fairy Wings instead of the individual components will be more profitable. The wings sell for 8 Gold Coins, whereas the components sell for a collective 2 Gold Coins 90 Silver Coins.
title: Black Fairy Dust
